sentence.text: It's awesome However recently there is lapse to receive the message . Didn't receive notification until open up the app.
Love it. Excellent app. Easiest way to keep in touch with my close and dear. Cheers.
I like it It is that best way to chat every one

Become very unstable and unsupported to my device Now a days it gives a big problem for my HTC desire V device whenever someone or group chat text message me in marathi language or used in more smily in that message that time whatsapp is directly closed and suddenly come back to the home screen and never open it....
Excellent Cool app. With many stickers... Stay connected with ur frndz

Sucks to the core. Doesn't deserve even a single star. Why do I always have to update aaps:( and I kept getting msg from server to update it. But I ignored since I dint wanna update it. Now I cannot update the new version. This is more than 7th time m trying to update and I just cannot. It just stops in between. I even dont want the new version since people are comenting saying it aint that good. Why is it compulsory to update it?;p anyways please help to get it downloaded? Otherwise ill take back that 1 star also:p
Increase participants in a group increase participants in a group Update it...
Great Its great for texting with mates or friends always aware of the gossip its like a bbm put for android the thing is when I text and send I always make a mistake and wish I could take it back
Unconditionally 5 star. This is a must have app. Love the smileys, available in watsapp. Wish there were some animated smileys too.
Eazy to excess Great way to communute.
Awesome app The best app... I really enjoy chatting in watsapp!!
Amazing ;-) Amazing app ... the best way to stay in touch with ur frnd.. sharw images ... videos . Songs .. group chat ... great aap .. works perfectly .. CHEERS :-)
Great. At times even faster than ordinary sms.
Awesome app !!! This is d best app ever but can anyone tell me how to turn off ur last seen ? Tnx

It's the best It's quick and easy to use and never let's me down and I don't have to spend credit while having a conversation! I totally recommend it for anyone.
An average app It's good.. but when it comes to "updating", it's pathetic!! :-P
No Galaxy Gear support Please create an app for Galaxy Gear. I can only read the notifications on my Gear. I would love to have an option to reply directly from my Gear. Thanks.
Brilliant It's a great way to keep in contact with people you know :)
Good feature I like this apps, but we need voice call also.
Awsme app I juz love dis app its so easy nd free

I like this app, which allow us to chat, share music and video... But in my mobile, after downloading the app, it works six months after that again it shows date failure and it will not work... Again I have to download...

Samsung Gt-i8262 Facing problem while attaching image, audio or video files. It is taking lot of time or sometimes get failed. Even the messenges that are being send gets shuffled. Really time consuming.. Please fix it..
Keeps crashing Not only did it crash, it also wiped my whole phone. Now it's uninstalled my Galaxy S4 is running great again. I'd have given it 0 stars if I could.
Nice app.. Nice apps. Chat & calling will be easier using this app. Only one problem when using this app, please fix the bugs..

Can't get enough Brilliant app. Switched to a Samsung Galaxy Note 2 after an iPhone and noticed the option to switch off timestamps is unavailable on Samsung devices. If this could be included in the next update, 5 star rating sorted.
